    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from class: JsonRpcClient
        Closes this client. Once a client has been closed, it is not available for further networking use (i.e. can't be reconnected or rebound). A new client needs to be created.
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
        Overrides:
        close in class JsonRpcClient
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when closing this client.
        See Also:
        JsonRpcClient.isClosed()
